Reviews.Title: Great LCD TV - Much better price at Sams Club
Reviews.Author: Robbi Shumaker
Reviews.Content: We've only had this TV for a day, and we don't have our High Definition Cable service yet, but the picture is still really good.  My husband says it will be even better when we get HD channels (our new service is on the way).The colors are great and I love the fact that there is no glare on the picture.  We were going to get another TV with a few more features, but the picture had such a glare on it, we changed our minds.I will say though for anyone buying this TV at this price - think twice - we honestly only paid $748 for this exact TV at Samsclub.  We just got it today, August 25th, 2010, so I think this price on Amazon is horrible - more than twice what we paid.The TV is very stylish and easy to set up too.  If you decide on this one, and buy it somewhere cheaper, I think you'll love it.

Reviews.Title: awesome tv
Reviews.Author: happycamer
Reviews.Content: I have just purchased the TV and it is awesome,easy set up and so light.I only paid $599.00 and then I purchased an extended warranty.We have never owned a flat screen tv,all of ours are the old heavy,bulky TV's. I was worried that we may have spent too much for it,but I guess not.

Reviews.Title: Great TV - Terrible price
Reviews.Author: Tinker
Reviews.Content: Since sending several notes w/links about the price I figure this is how you have any impact whatsoever.SAMSUNG LISTS THE MSRP OF THIS SET AT ~$720.  There's no excuse for the price asked by cabo-wabo.

ProductInfo.Features:
The Samsung LN40C610 features 1080p picture quality
Auto Motion Plus 120Hz brings action movies and sports to life with frame-to-frame smooth motion
1920x1080 full high definition resolution and 1,080p horizontal lines create sharp details
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung 40" LN40C610 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV
